categories: Category:Battles in the Allied Tion sector

nodes.text: First Battle of the Lianna system

A battle occurred in the Lianna system between the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders and the Galactic Republic sometime between 3973 BBY and 3965 BBY, during the early years of the conflict known as the Mandalorian Wars. The system was later liberated by the Republic.
The battle is only referenced once in 2009's The Essential Atlas. It is marked on a galactic map showing the battles of the Mandalorian Wars rather than described in prose.
